description:
Japan's declining birth rate is unstoppable and engineering has advanced.
On her way home from work, Ruri picked up Aizen, a male prostitute android who was abandoned in a corner of the city.
Ruri stayed up all night repairing Aizen, but because the owner of Aizen neglected regular inspections, she was able to keep her body for five days.
Ruri will spend the final five days with Aizen.

Genre: AVG (ADV), R18
Otome (Maiden) Adventure Game, Near future Fantasy Setting
